summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a gameplay scene set in a snowy forest environment. The player character, dressed in fur clothing and wielding a staff, is engaged in combat with two winged enemies. One enemy is highlighted with a red arrow and has a visible health bar above its head, indicating it is the current target. The user interface displays health and stamina bars at the bottom left, alongside four icons representing abilities or items. On the bottom right, additional icons suggest more abilities or actions available to the player, with button prompts for RT (right trigger) and LT (left trigger) on a controller. The image suggests a focus on strategic combat and resource management in this section of the game.
